info.title: PowerSource

powersource.name: powersource
powersource.description: This Resource list the available power sources for the Device. The Property "powersources" is a list that is read only and is informative only. If there is more than 1 power source active, use multiple Resources to indicate the active power sources. If the power source is unknown use the value "unknown".

sourcefault.name: sourcefault
sourcefault.description: Fault detected in currently active power source. True = fault detected
